transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom I want to wish
everybody a very happy passover and i
just thought i'd show my Passover plate
here just before I begin the Passover
Exodus 12 meal with my family and
brothers and sisters in Messiah we have
the we have the lamb right here which of
course represents Yahshua the lamb the
perfect sacrifice we have the unleavened
bread which represents how there's no 11
or no sin within Yahshua who is the
sacrifice and then we have the choice to
have bitter herbs it's commanded in
Exodus 12 so the bitter herbs I chose
was this horseradish and parsley and the
bitter herbs represent the bitterness of
sin that Yahshua the Messiah delivered
us from so this is the Passover meal and
I'm going to go enjoy the the Passover
with my my family my friends so I just
wishing all of you a very happy passover
2014 Shalom
